sentences.english: Will not be jealous with each other before we can really their advantage.
sentences.chinese: 彼此不会吃醋，才可以真的无所不谈。

sentences.english: Cuz we can talk it through.
But, if you want the freedom to anywhere, talk about anything, then write books.
sentences.chinese: 但是，如果你想无拘无束无所不谈，那应该去写书。

sentences.english: The two friends happily drank and talked about many subjects.
sentences.chinese: 这两个朋友愉快地喝酒聊天几乎无所不谈。

除了离婚可以无所不谈。

sentences.english: Bobby is very sociable, he can talk to you about almost everything.
sentences.chinese: 波比是个好交际的人，他会跟你无所不谈。
